sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_NM ,NVL2(T1.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB,T1.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC||' '||T1.GIS_ASSETS_LNM ||'-'||T1.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC ||' '|| T1.GIS_ASSETS_LNM) AS GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_AR ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR ,T4.PRT_AT_CODE_NM ,T4.MNG_YEAR ,T4.MNG_NO ,T4.MNG_CNT ,T4.ENTRPS_NM ,T4.USAGE_AR ,T4.USAGE_PD_FROM ,T4.USAGE_PD_TO ,T4.FEE FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019', T2.PRT_AT_CODE) AS PRT_AT_CODE_NM ,T2.MNG_YEAR ,T2.MNG_NO ,T2.MNG_CNT ,GAM_GETENTRPSNM(T3.ENTRPSCD, '1') ENTRPS_NM ,T2.USAGE_AR ,TO_CHAR(T2.USAGE_PD_FROM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USAGE_PD_FROM ,TO_CHAR(T2.USAGE_PD_TO, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USAGE_PD_TO ,T2.FEE ,T2.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE ,T2.GIS_ASSETS_CD ,T2.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD FROM ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F T2 INNER JOIN ASSETS_RENT_F T3 ON (T2.PRT_AT_CODE=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND T2.MNG_YEAR=T3.MNG_YEAR AND T2.MNG_NO=T3.MNG_NO AND T2.MNG_CNT=T3.MNG_CNT) WHERE 1=1 AND T3.PRMISN_YN='Y'
AND T2.USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#sDtFr#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND T2.USAGE_PD_TO < TO_DATE(#sDtTo#,'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
AND T2.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND T3.ENTRPSCD = #sRegistEntrpsCd#
)T4 ON (T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=T4.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD=T4.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=T4.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) WHERE 1=1
AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #sGisAssetsNm# || '%'
ORDER BY T4.MNG_YEAR, T4.MNG_NO, T4.MNG_CNT ) S ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS DATA_COUNT ,SUM(T1.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR) AS SUM_ASSETS_AR ,SUM(T4.USAGE_AR) AS SUM_USAGE_AR ,SUM(T4.FEE) AS SUM_FEE FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019', T2.PRT_AT_CODE) AS PRT_AT_CODE_NM ,T2.MNG_YEAR ,T2.MNG_NO ,T2.MNG_CNT ,T2.USAGE_AR ,TO_CHAR(T2.USAGE_PD_FROM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USAGE_PD_FROM ,TO_CHAR(T2.USAGE_PD_TO, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USAGE_PD_TO ,T2.FEE ,T2.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE ,T2.GIS_ASSETS_CD ,T2.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD FROM ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F T2 INNER JOIN ASSETS_RENT_F T3 ON (T2.PRT_AT_CODE=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND T2.MNG_YEAR=T3.MNG_YEAR AND T2.MNG_NO=T3.MNG_NO AND T2.MNG_CNT=T3.MNG_CNT) WHERE 1=1 AND T3.PRMISN_YN='Y'
AND T2.USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#sDtFr#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND T2.USAGE_PD_TO < TO_DATE(#sDtTo#,'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
AND T2.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND T3.ENTRPSCD = #sRegistEntrpsCd#
)T4 ON (T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=T4.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD=T4.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=T4.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) WHERE 1=1
AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #sGisAssetsNm# || '%'
